item.title: Hacker News Top Stories: Tuesday, March 11, 2025 at 7:15 AM UTC
item.description:
1. A Supersolid Made Using Photons (30 points | 9 comments)
2. Show HN: Seven39, a social media app that is only open for 3 hours every evening (201 points | 134 comments)
3. A succinct email in just a subject line (14 points | 9 comments)
4. Bending Spacetime in the Basement (1997) (133 points | 19 comments)
5. Software-Defined Radio for Engineers (2018) [pdf] (239 points | 56 comments)
6. Mathematical Foundations of Reinforcement Learning (277 points | 25 comments)
7. What made the Irish famine so deadly (183 points | 238 comments)
8. Asking LLMs to create my game Shepard's Dog (71 points | 13 comments)
9. Canon EF and RF Lenses – All Autofocus Motors (431 points | 104 comments)
10. HyperShell X Outdoor PowerSuit Exoskeleton (59 points | 36 comments)
11. Bel in Clojure (2022) (22 points | discuss)
12. Extreme poverty in India has dropped to negligible levels (40 points | 20 comments)
13. Zero-Downtime Kubernetes Deployments on AWS with EKS (133 points | 69 comments)
14. The Einstein AI Model (159 points | 143 comments)
15. Kubernetes Home – what do you do if your ISP changes your IP addresses? (27 points | 26 comments)
16. How Facebook Marketplace is keeping young people on the platform (8 points | 8 comments)
17. How to Implement a Cosine Similarity Function in TypeScript (64 points | 24 comments)
18. Show HN: In-Browser Graph RAG with Kuzu-WASM and WebLLM (117 points | 27 comments)
19. An election forecast that’s 50-50 is not “giving up” (50 points | 54 comments)
20. Arranging invisible icons in quadratic time (2021) (35 points | 10 comments)
21. STEPS Toward the Reinvention of Programming (2012) [pdf] (71 points | 46 comments)
22. Firmware update bricks HP printers, makes them unable to use HP cartridges (156 points | 135 comments)
23. Music labels will regret coming for the Internet Archive, sound historian says (386 points | 132 comments)
24. A technical history of Acorn Computers (97 points | 39 comments)
25. Nasdaq halts high-speed trading service after regulatory pressure (13 points | discuss)
26. Shef (52 points | 24 comments)
27. Probabilistic Artificial Intelligence (299 points | 77 comments)
28. Trees not profits: we're giving up our right to ever sell Ecosia (2018) (300 points | 186 comments)
29. Show HN: Editable Games (125 points | 25 comments)
30. 3dfx: So powerful, it's kind of ridiculous (2023) (248 points | 213 comments)
